With carbon emissions increasingly in focus
created_at: ammonia propulsion has emerged as a possible solution for the aviation industry -- though the largest ammonia makers are still in the very early stages of exploring how to produce green ammonia at scale. Adopting ammonia propulsion in aviation would be beneficial for existing engine makers including GE
column3: Rolls-Royce and MTU Aero Engines AG
